signin.title: Enter your email below to login your account

delete.title: Are you absolutely sure?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

description.step1: Choose a thumbnail for the blog post. This image will be displayed as a preview in the blog list.
description.step2: Write the title, description and content in Romanian for the blog post.
description.step3: Write the title, description and content in Russian for the blog post.
description.step4: Write the title, description and content in English for the blog post.
description.step5: Choose whether the post will be public or private.
description.publicDescription: If checked, the post will be visible to everyone. If not, it will be private and accessible only to administrators and users with permissions.

description.step2: Edit the title and description in Romanian.
description.step3: Edit the title and description in Russian.
description.step4: Edit the title and description in English and post visibility.
description.publicDescription: If checked, the post will be visible to everyone. If not, it will be private and accessible only to administrators and users with permissions.

create.title: Create service
create.description: Provide the necessary details to create a new service.
create.publicDescription: If checked, the service will be available to all users. If not, it will be private and accessible only to administrators.

update.title: Update service

description.step2: Edit the title and description in Romanian.
description.step3: Edit the title and description in Russian.
description.step4: Edit the title and description in English and service visibility.

update.publicDescription: If checked, the service will be available to all users. If not, it will be private and accessible only to administrators.

create.title: Create location category
create.description: Enter the multilingual information needed to create a new location category.

update.title: Update location category
update.description: Modify the multilingual details for this location category.

create.title: Create location subcategory
create.description: Fill in the subcategory details in all supported languages.

update.title: Update location subcategory
update.description: Modify the multilingual details for this subcategory.

ro.label: Location subcategory (Romanian)
ro.placeholder: Ex: Downtown, Residential area, Industrial zone (RO)

ru.label: Location subcategory (Russian)
ru.placeholder: Ex: Downtown, Residential area, Industrial zone (RU)

en.label: Location subcategory (English)
en.placeholder: e.g. Downtown, Residential area, Industrial zone

create.title: Create condition
create.description: Enter the housing condition details in all supported languages. After submission, the condition will be added to the system and available for use in relevant modules.

update.title: Update condition
update.description: Edit the details of an existing housing condition. Update multilingual names or other relevant fields to keep information accurate and current.

create.title: Create housing type
create.description: Enter the necessary information to add a new housing stock type. After submission, the record will be saved and available in the system.

update.title: Update housing type
update.description: Modify the details of an existing housing stock type. You can update the name, description, and other relevant fields to reflect the most accurate and up-to-date information.

create.title: Create apartment feature
create.description: Fill in the apartment feature details in all supported languages. After submission, the feature will be added to the system and available for use in relevant modules.

update.title: Update apartment feature
update.description: Edit the details of an existing apartment feature. Update multilingual names or other relevant fields to keep information accurate and current.

create.title: Create commercial destination
create.description: Fill in the commercial destination details in all supported languages. After submission, the destination will be added to the system and available for use in relevant modules.

update.title: Update commercial destination
update.description: Edit the details of an existing commercial destination. Update multilingual names or other relevant fields to keep information accurate and current.

create.title: Create commercial feature
create.description: Fill in the commercial feature details in all supported languages. After submission, the feature will be added to the system and available for use in relevant modules.

update.title: Update commercial feature
update.description: Edit the details of an existing commercial feature. Update multilingual names or other relevant fields to keep information accurate and current.

create.title: Create commercial placing
create.description: Fill in the commercial placing details in all supported languages. After submission, the placing will be added to the system and available for use in relevant modules.

update.title: Update commercial placing
update.description: Edit the details of an existing commercial placing. Update multilingual names or other relevant fields to keep information accurate and current.

ro.label: Commercial placing (Romanian)
ro.placeholder: Ex: First floor, Ground floor, Outside (RO)

ru.label: Commercial placing (Russian)
ru.placeholder: Ex: First floor, Ground floor, Outside (RU)

en.label: Commercial placing (English)
en.placeholder: e.g. First floor, Ground floor, Outside

create.title: Create house feature
create.description: Fill in the house feature details in all supported languages. After submission, the feature will be added to the system and available for use in relevant modules.

update.title: Update house feature
update.description: Edit the details of an existing house feature. Update multilingual names or other relevant fields to keep information accurate and current.

create.title: Create terrain feature
create.description: Fill in the terrain feature details in all supported languages. After submission, the feature will be added to the system and available for use in relevant modules.

update.title: Update terrain feature
update.description: Edit the details of an existing terrain feature. Update multilingual names or other relevant fields to keep information accurate and current.

create.title: Create terrain usability
create.description: Fill in the terrain usability details in all supported languages. After submission, the usability will be added to the system and available for use in relevant modules.

update.title: Update terrain usability
update.description: Edit the details of an existing terrain usability. Update multilingual names or other relevant fields to keep information accurate and current.
